protocol.name: P-GSE55913-1
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Microarray Suit version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis setting and Quantile as nomalization method. ID_REF =  VALUE = MAS5.0 signal intensity ABS_CALL =  DETECTION P-VALUE =

protocol.name: P-GSE55913-3
protocol.text: Seeds were sterlized and plated on 1/2 MS medium, and then stratified for 4 days before growing in a growth in a growth camber at 23˚C under long day conditions (16 h light and 8 h dark).

protocol.name: P-GSE55913-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted from 2-week-old Arabidopsis seedling using RNeasy mini kit (Qiagen).

protocol.name: P-GSE55913-5
protocol.text: Five microgram of total RNA was used to generate double-stranded cDNA using GeneChip one-cycle cDNA synthesis kit (Affymetrix) with T7 promoter-containing oligo(dT)primer. Synthesized cDNA was in vitro transcribed and biotinylated using the GeneChip IVT labelilng kit (Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE55913-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 10ug of cRNA were hybiridized for 16 h at 45˚C on Affymetrix ATH1 genome arrays using and Affymetrix Fluidics Station 450

protocol.name: P-GSE55913-7
protocol.text: Gene Chip were scanned using the GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G
